articles.author: Ben Berkowitz
articles.title: Trump tells Apple to build iPhones in U.S. or pay 25% tariff - Axios
articles.description: It's a dramatic escalation with the tech giant, which was reportedly planning to move production from China to India.
articles.content:
President Trump on Friday warned Apple that it needed to build U.S.-sold iPhones in the United States or face a 25% tariff.
Why it matters: Apple already committed to a $500 billion U.S. expansion, … [+1718 chars]
